name: mobile-first-web-design
description: Autonomous playbook for mobile-first responsive web design

steps.name: analyze-viewport
steps.action: Analyze current viewport handling and breakpoints

steps.name: mobile-baseline
steps.action: Ensure mobile styles are the baseline (no media query)

steps.name: progressive-enhancement
steps.action: Add progressive enhancements for larger screens using min-width queries

steps.name: performance-check
steps.action: Check image optimization and lazy loading for mobile

steps.name: accessibility-audit
steps.action: Run accessibility checks for mobile experience

tailwindClasses.mobileFirst: Use unprefixed classes for mobile, sm: md: lg: for larger
